_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Six qualities that prevent a mendicant f: Not keeping their mind in check when they should
Not exerting their mind when they should
Not encouraging the mind when they should
Not watching over the mind with equanimity when they should
Six qualities that enable a mendicant to: Keeping their mind in check when they should
Exerting their mind when they should
Encouraging the mind when they should
Watching over the mind with equanimity when they should
